signals.Ask: We need the ability to integrate with Google Docs for our knowledge base, allowing us to add entire folders and monitor them for relevant content.
signals.Evidence: Is it only notion? That got this feature or the other apps? Google docs, I guess, Google? Docs you said, then you have got the options to download. I mean, upload those documents right from here. So those could be the custom ones, yeah. Yeah, but this is only one at a time, right? I mean, we can add a whole let's say an entire folder and just say watch this folder and see if there's anything in there that's relevant.
